Package bomberman.model.config

Class ControlsConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.model.config.ControlsConfig
  • public class ControlsConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the configuration of the controls for one player (see Player).
    Author:
    Felix Bachmann

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlsConfig

        public ControlsConfig​(int up,
                      int down,
                      int left,
                      int right,
                      int plant,
                      int pause)
        Creates a new instance with supplied key codes.
        Parameters:
        up - KeyEvent constant for a virtual key for moving upwards
        down - KeyEvent constant for a virtual key for moving downwards
        left - KeyEvent constant for a virtual key for moving leftwards
        right - KeyEvent constant for a virtual key for moving rightwards
        plant - KeyEvent constant for a virtual key for planting a bomb
        pause - KeyEvent constant for a virtual key for (un)pausing the game
